title: Best of the Program | 6/28/22
description:
Fifty immigrants tragically died while being transported in the back of a semi-truck. Pat goes through the worst-run cities in America, and they all have a common theme: Democrats run them. Justice Clarence Thomas is getting most of the heat for the overturning of Roe v. Wade, putting the Left’s racism on full display.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
